name: watcharr
description: Watcharr is a self-hosted media watchlist and tracking app. It lets users manage movies and series they want to watch, sync with external services, and see stats in a clean UI.

features.title: Watchlist Management
features.description: Create and organize lists of movies and TV shows you want to watch across streaming

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Integrate with Trakt, Plex, or Jellyfin to sync watch history and keep lists up to

features.title: Release Calendar
features.description: View upcoming releases and new episodes for shows on your watchlist with calendar integration

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: See viewing stats including total watch time, genres watched, and completion rates

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Create separate profiles for family members with individual watchlists and preferences

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find movies and shows quickly with search powered by TMDB or other metadata providers
